The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 27 - 18 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 30 - 17 ) 117 - 115 on Saturday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the 76ers 33 - 33 in the first quarter alone . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers went just 40 percent from the floor and a meager 34 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder were also able to force the Sixers into 39 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . The Thunder were led by Joel Embiid , who went 11 - for - 19 from the field and 8 - for - 12 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a blocked shot . Over his last five games , he 's now boasting averages of 28 points , 11 rebounds and 9 assists per game . Russell Westbrook also had a big game , finishing with 21 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 7 FT ) , 10 rebounds and six assists . He had shot below 40 percent from the field in four out of his last five games coming into Saturday , so it was good to see him get back on track . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Ben Simmons , who came off the bench for 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 8 FT ) in 38 minutes . The Sixers ' next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Monday , while the Sixers will be at home against the Houston Rockets on Monday .

The Raptors also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording seven more assists than Philadelphia , while committing three less turnovers . The Sixers ( 48 - 27 ) continue to sport the NBA 's worst record , but that has n't deterred them from playing hard in the majority of recent games . Philadelphia came into this game as a rare road favorite and could n't muster up enough for a win . The key for Milwaukee was their shooting , as they shot 45 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range in their win . Philadelphia shot 45 percent from the field and assisted on 26 of their 42 made baskets . They also dominated the rebounding and turnover differential , as they outrebounded the Sixers 50 - 43 and shot 12 - for - 34 from long distance in their win . The Sixers have been playing some great ball recently , but this was a baffling loss against a struggling 76ers team . Joel Embiid had his best game of the season , as he tallied 34 points , 13 rebounds , three assists , two steals and three blocks while shooting 12 - for - 22 from the field . Khris Middleton also played well , as he amassed 22 points , three rebounds and four assists . George Hill was the only other Sixers player in triple - figures , as he amassed 20 points , five assists and five rebounds . The Bucks have a quick turnaround , as they play the Chicago Bulls on Saturday in their next game . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 125 - 109 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 51 - 31 ) have been one of the most porous defenses in the NBA throughout the entire season , while the Sixers ( 22 - 31 ) , as customary , have been one of the most prolific scoring squads . Both of those patterns held true Wednesday , as Philadelphia compiled a whopping 67 percent success rate from the field and an equally impressive 46 percent tally from the free - throw line , and 38 percent from three - point range . The Milwaukee Bucks took down the visiting New York Knicks on Monday , 124 - 113 . Milwaukee ( 3 - 0 ) has now won four of its last five contests after a horrendous start to the season that had seated them at last in the Eastern Conference . On Monday , the team saw the return of star point guard Eric Bledsoe to a bench role . Middleton had 16 points , four rebounds , and 13 assists on the night . The team also shot impeccably , hitting 48 percent from the field and hitting 42 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks ( 1 - 10 ) , meanwhile , has been surging lately , pushing their way to the playoff picture after a dismal 18 - 30 start to the season . On Monday , the Knicks showed the intensity that led them to their playoff push , out - rebounding the Bucks by seven and coming away with 14 forced turnovers . Center Giannis Antetokounmpo led the team with 31 points while also pulling down 15 rebounds and dishing out four assists . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 144 - 112 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . It 's rare to see Atlanta dominated in their home building , but that was just the case here in this near wire - to - wire win for Milwaukee . The Bucks actually led by at least 19 points for the entirety of the second half , as the final 14 - point margin was their largest lead of the game . Milwaukee was lights - out from the field , shooting 55 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Atlanta , despite committing eight less turnovers . The Hawks ( 27 - 10 ) have been one of the best teams in the NBA over recent weeks and a road win in Atlanta just adds to their impressive resume ' . Their offense was a huge performance , as they shot 55 percent from the field and assisted on 36 of their 55 made baskets . Their defense was n't bad either , as they held Atlanta to 44 percent from the field and 34 percent from three - point range . Giannis Antetokounmpo was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 16 points , eight rebounds and 10 assists . Dewayne Dedmon started at center and totaled 12 points and eight rebounds .

Three-point shooting was a huge factor as well , with Boston hitting just 8 - of - 30 from long distance , while Detroit went 8 - of - 30 . In fact , the Celtics pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 75 - plus minutes . Defense was key , as they held Chicago to 39 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was a huge factor as well , as the Celtics recorded 27 assists to 13 turnovers , while the Bulls committed 22 turnovers to 16 assists . Chicago had one of their best three - point shooting games of the year too , going 15 - of - 34 from long distance , which marks a season - high in makes . There were nine ties and 14 lead changes , as this game came down to the final seconds . Boston ( 8 - 6 ) has really struggled on defense this season and this blowout loss only adds to those troubles . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 26 ) have been one of the most porous defenses in the NBA throughout the entire season , while the Celtics ( 27 - 18 ) , as customary , have been one of the most prolific scoring squads . Both of those patterns held true Friday , as Mike Conley led the way with a game - high 26 points , while Marcus Smart , filling in for Jimmy Butler ( knee ) at the starting lineup , posted 20 points , six rebounds , three assists , three steals and a block . Al Horford and Marcus Smart posted matching four - point efforts , with the former adding three rebounds and one assist , and the latter registering six rebounds , three assists and three steals . Jaylen Brown was productive in a reserve role as well , generating 12 points , six rebounds , an assist and two blocks . Kyrie Irving 's game - high 38 points paced Memphis , a total he supplemented with four assists and a steal . Marcus Smart logged another start for Avery Bradley ( Achilles ) and posted 20 points , three assists , six rebounds , three steals and a block . Al Horford registered 18 points , three rebounds and an assist . Marc Gasol posted a modest four points but hauled in 11 boards , dished out 12 assists and recorded a steal and a block . Justin Holiday paced the bench with 14 points , six rebounds , two assists and four steals . The Grizzlies head back home to take on the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday night , while the Grizzlies head to Atlanta to take on the Raptors on Saturday evening as well .

Tyler Johnson was productive as a reserve as well with nine points , two assists , a rebound and a steal . The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Cavaliers , 123 - 50 , at TD Garden on Wednesday evening . The Celtics led 27 - 27 after the first quarter , but the Celtics woke up in the second , cutting the deficit to five points to tie the game at 105 with 8:40 left in the fourth . However , the Celtics came out of the locker room firing on all cylinders and pushed the lead back up to 23 heading into the fourth . However , the Cavaliers were not deterred , as they came out of the dressing room with a fire lit beneath them . They fought to regain the lead with 6:24 left in the third and did not look back , leading the entire fourth quarter , while stretching the deficit to as many as 11 in the quarter . The Celtics came out of the locker room with a strong third quarter and continued to apply pressure into the fourth , leading by six , with five minutes left in the game . However , Boston came out strong in the third , ensuring themselves a 15 - point lead heading into the final quarter . Boston was up by two heading into the fourth but the Cavaliers woke up , leading by as many as 11 in the third quarter , where they held the Cavs to only 40 percent shooting from the field and 15 percent from long range from the field . They also shot 52 percent from the field and 48 percent from long range , while holding the Cavaliers to 50 percent from the field and 15 percent from long range . Terry Rozier led the Celtics with 26 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 3Pt ) , eight rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 25 minutes off the bench . Ante sensation Gordon Hayward contributed 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , along with five rebounds and two steals , in 25 minutes . Gordon Hayward chipped in 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , along with five rebounds and two steals , in 25 minutes . Gordon Hayward chipped in 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , along with five rebounds and two steals , in 25 minutes . Gordon Hayward chipped in 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) of his own , along with five rebounds and two steals , in 25 minutes off the bench . Jordan Clarkson chipped in 14 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) and two rebounds , in 22 minutes off the bench . Boston shot 52 percent from the field and only 13 percent from three - point land . Next , the Cavaliers will host the Heat on Saturday . The Celtics host the Warriors on Saturday .

The Boston Celtics defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 104 , at TD Garden on Monday . Despite the Nets leading for the first 55 minutes , this game was tight throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 15 points , as it came down to the final seconds . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Celtics going 13 - of - 40 from long distance , while the Nets went just 13 - of - 34 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Celtics recording 29 assists to 17 turnovers , while the Nets committed 17 turnovers to 20 assists . The Nets ( 27 - 24 ) had to play this game without John Batum , but they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Celtics . Jaylen Brown led the team in scoring , as he tallied 21 points , six rebounds and two assists on 9 - of - 16 shooting off the bench . Al Horford recorded a double - double , totaling 14 points , 11 rebounds and five assists . Aron Baynes was huge off the bench , providing 14 points , nine rebounds and three blocks . The Nets ( 27 - 24 ) have now lost five of their last six games , as they continue to fight for the final playoff spot in the east . The Boston Celtics defeated the Charlotte Hornets 126 - 94 Wednesday at TD Garden . It was a wire - to - wire victory for the Celtics ( 32 - 19 ) , who have now won two in a row after a four - game losing streak . Rookie point guard Jaylen Brown led the team in scoring off the bench with 24 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting and went a perfect 2 - of - 8 from three - point range . Center Al Horford , meanwhile , scored 14 points to go with seven rebounds , five assists , two blocks , and two steals . The veteran forward shot 7 - of - 9 and was a perfect 0 - of - 0 on three - pointers . As a team , Boston shot impeccably from beyond the arc , going 12 - of - 14 from deep and shooting 12 - of - 29 from beyond the arc . For the Hornets , meanwhile , rookie rookie Jaylen Brown had a big night for the Celtics ' offense . Brown scored a team - high 24 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting . He added 2 - of - 8 from beyond the arc . Charlotte ( 24 - 26 ) has been one of the hottest teams in the league , but fell down to ninth place with the loss to Boston . Defense was a major problem for the Hornets , as they allowed the Hornets to shoot over 100 percent and hit 12 - of - 40 from three - point range . The Hornets will face the Grizzlies on Friday , while the Celtics will take on the Knicks .

In fact , the Celtics pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 50 - plus minutes . Defense was key , as they held Detroit to 43 percent shooting , while forcing them to commit 11 turnovers . The Celtics ended up shooting 51 percent from the field , while holding the Pistons to just 43 percent . The rebounding differential was glaring , with the Celtics winning that battle , 47 - 41 . The Pistons ( 26 - 30 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Denver 's offense was led by Tobias Harris , who posted 19 points , 10 rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal , while Gary Harris was right behind him with 20 points of his own . Lou Williams was productive in a reserve role as well , supplying 14 points , five assists and a rebound . The Nuggets were led by Tobias Harris 's 19 points , which he supplemented with 10 rebounds and an assist . Gary Harris continued his strong play with 20 points , three rebounds and two assists . Danilo Gallinari tallied 16 points , eight rebounds and one assist . Lou Williams paced the bench with 14 points , five rebounds and two assists . Danilo Gallinari was next with 16 points , eight rebounds and one assist . Shai supplying 11 points , a rebound , four assists , a steal and a block , while Patrick Beverley went for 0 - of - 8 from the field , including 0 - for - 5 from three - point range . The Clippers head to Phoenix to take on the Thunder on Saturday afternoon , while the Clippers head to Los Angeles to face off with the Suns on Friday night .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 108 - 92 Friday at Staples Center . The supposedly tanking Clippers ( 1 - 1 ) came into Friday 's contest with a plethora of injuries , missing the likes of Rudy Gay ( Achilles ) , Omri Casspi ( foot ) and Garrett Temple ( calf ) . However , as a result , the Clippers ( 1 - 1 ) came into the game sporting one of the NBA 's stingiest defenses , having allowed the fourth - worst record in the NBA . Since the Supersonics franchise was relocated to Oklahoma before the 2008 - 11 season , the Thunder have found themselves as a legitimate contender early on in the season . The Thunder ( 0 - 2 ) did not get off to a hot start in the first quarter , but the Clippers ( 1 - 2 ) did not play the second half of a back - to - back . Paul George led the way with a game - high 20 points on 7 - of - 27 shooting , to go along with eight rebounds and four assists in 26 minutes . Tobias Harris was the only other starter to score in double figures with 26 points , to go along with five rebounds and four assists , while Lou Williams added 17 points on 4 - of - 12 shooting . Steven Gortat was the only other Clippers player to score in double figures , as he scored 17 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting . The Clippers were led by Danilo Gallinari , who scored 26 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with five rebounds and one assist . Raymond Felton added 12 points , four rebounds and three assists in 23 minutes off the bench , while Raymond Felton pitched in 12 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting . Next up , the Clippers host the Houston Kings on Sunday , while the Thunder visit the Sacramento Rockets on Sunday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the host Houston Rockets , 115 - 112 , at Staples Center on Sunday . In a battle between two of the best defenses in the NBA , this game was tight throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 8 points , as it came down to the final seconds . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Clippers going just 15 - of - 25 from the charity stripe , while Houston could only hit 11 - of - 15 . The Clippers also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than Houston , while committing three less turnovers . The Clippers ( 2 - 1 ) continue to be one of the disappointments of the league , as they melted down in their own building . James Harden led the team in scoring , tallying 31 points , four assists and two steals in the win . Montrezl Harrell was second on the team in scoring , dropping 23 points off the bench . Montrezl Harrell got a rare start at center and totaled 17 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . On deck for the Clippers is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday . The Rockets ( 1 - 2 ) have been one of the disappointments of the season and a game like this is the last thing they needed . James Harden was the player of the game , accumulating 31 points , four rebounds and 14 assists on 11 - of - 26 shooting . Danilo Gallinari was second on the team , with his 20 points and nine boards . Montrezl Harrell got the start at center and dropped 17 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks on 8 - of - 10 shooting . Eric Gordon provided 21 points , five rebounds and two assists of his own off the bench as well . On deck for the Clippers is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Tuesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the host Washington Wizards 136 - 104 , at Staples Center on Sunday . In a battle between two struggling teams , there were numerous swings , as it was clear both squads were desperate for a win . There were 12 ties and 14 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Clippers recording 35 assists to 14 turnovers , while the Wizards committed 14 turnovers to just 18 assists . The Clippers ( 4 - 2 ) had a tough task here against a desperate Wizards team and they fell just short in this tight battle . Tobias Harris led the way for Washington , as he tallied 22 points and 11 rebounds on 9 - of - 14 shooting . John Wall was n't far behind , as he tallied 18 points , three rebounds , five assists and four steals . Avery Bradley matched that 15 points , as he added one rebound and five assists to his tally . Boban Marjanovic was the only bench player in double figures , dropping 13 points and nine rebounds on 6 - of - 7 from the field . Avery Bradley was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 15 points , two rebounds and five assists . The Wizards ( 1 - 5 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and they nearly pulled out another upset here . It was a team effort for Washington , as they shot just 39 percent from the field and 19 percent from three - point range . Tobias Harris led Washington in scoring , as he provided 22 points and 11 rebounds on 9 - of - 14 shooting . John Wall was n't far behind , as he tallied 18 points , three rebounds and five assists . In a battle between two of the worst defenses in the NBA , the more potent offense was able to prevail with a gigantic win . The key for Los Angeles was their rebounding , as they snatched down 43 boards to the Timberwolves ' 38 . The Clippers ended up shooting 49 percent from the field , while holding the Timberwolves to just 47 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Clippers recording 30 assists to 12 turnovers , while the Timberwolves committed 11 turnovers to 20 assists . Derrick Rose led the Timberwolves in scoring , as he dropped 21 points , four rebounds and four assists . Karl-Anthony Towns recorded a double - double , totaling 20 points , 12 rebounds , three steals and four blocks . Lou Williams was a nice spark off the bench , providing 20 points and six assists . The Warriors also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording five more assists than Los Angeles , while committing three less turnovers . The Hornets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 23 - 22 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Hornets shot the ball well , going 53 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went just 47 percent from the floor and a meager 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Hornets were led by the duo of Marc Gasol and Nicolas Batum . Gasol recorded a triple - triple with 22 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 17 rebounds and 10 assists , while Gasol posted 22 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and 17 rebounds . It was his third triple - triple of the season , going for 22 points , 17 rebounds and 10 assists , as he 's been one of the few bright spots for the Grizzlies this season . Nicolas Batum was also very effective , finishing with 18 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 11 points and 12 rebounds on the year . The Hornets ' next game will be at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Sacramento Kings on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 99 - 96 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . This was a lopsided matchup on paper headed in and the Kings left no doubt who the better team was . It was a wire - to - wire win for Sacramento , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 36 minutes . Defense was key for the Kings , as they held the Grizzlies to 42 percent from the field , 30 percent from three - point range and 81 percent from the free - throw line . The Kings also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 49 - 44 . Omri Casspi led the way for Memphis , as he tallied 18 points , five rebounds and four steals . Nemanja Bjelica finished second on the team with 17 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and three steals off the bench . Marc Gasol was the only other Memphis player in double figures , as he accumulated 11 points and 10 rebounds . Buddy Hield led the team in scoring , as he dropped 26 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting . Nemanja Bjelica recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 17 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , three steals and three blocks . On deck for the Kings is a road matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Sunday . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 30 ) have now lost five of their last six games , as they continue to struggle . Omri Casspi led the team in scoring , as he dropped 18 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting off the bench . Marc Gasol was the only other Memphis player in double figures , as he accumulated 11 points , 10 rebounds and four steals in the defeat . Memphis will look to play better on Sunday in a road matchup against the Indiana Pacers .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Indiana Pacers , 106 - 103 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday . The Grizzlies have been dominant at home this season and this wire - to - wire win just adds to the resume . It was as one - sided as it could be , with the Grizzlies holding a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . Defense was key for the Grizzlies , as they held the Pacers to 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The Grizzlies also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Indiana , despite committing seven less turnovers . Indiana ( 20 - 30 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Mike Conley carried the load , as he tallied 22 points , four rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . Marc Gasol was n't far behind , as he accumulated 18 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Justin Holiday was a huge spark off the bench , providing 16 points , a rebound , four assists and two steals . Memphis will host the Denver Nuggets on Monday for their next game . The Pacers ( 32 - 16 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their 18th win in 33 games at home . Bojan Bogdanovic was the player of the game , accruing 21 points , five rebounds and two steals . Marc Gasol totaled 18 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals . Darren Collison was the only other Pacer in double figures , as he accrued 18 points and nine assists . Memphis will look to build off this win on Monday in a road matchup versus the Denver Nuggets .

The Nuggets also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording five more assists than Memphis , while committing three less turnovers . The Warriors got off to a strong start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 31 - 37 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Warriors shot the ball well , going 54 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 39 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from deep . The Warriors ' superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Mike Conley did most of the damage to the Warriors . It was his second 28 - point performance in a row , as he 's been a big reason for the Warriors ' success this season . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 45 points and 10 assists over his last two games . Conley on the other hand shot 5 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding eight assists . He 's now averaging 22 points and 7 assists on the season . The Miami Heat defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 95 - 88 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday . While these are two teams that have struggled this season , they left it all on the floor in this close - fought battle . It was a near wire - to - wire win for the Heat , as they led by double - digits for the final 22 minutes . Defense was key for the Heat , as they held the Spurs to 33 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range . The Spurs also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording five more assists than the Spurs , while committing three less turnovers . The Heat ( 5 - 5 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Spurs is just what they need to get going . Patty Mills led the team in scoring , as he tallied 20 points and four rebounds off the bench . DeMar DeRozan finished with 18 points and eight assists , but went just 6 - of - 15 from the field . LaMarcus Aldridge had one of his best games of the season , totaling six points , 16 rebounds and two blocks on 2 - of - 14 shooting . Justise Winslow went a perfect 7 - of - 17 from the field , but still accrued 16 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Heat will be in action again on Saturday , as they travel to San Antonio to face the Rockets . The Spurs ( 5 - 5 ) have been a different team at home this season and this sort of win shows why they are so scary in their home building . Hassan Whiteside did all he could for San Antonio , as he led the team with 29 points , 20 rebounds and nine blocks on 10 - of - 18 shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge finished second on the team , totaling 6 points , 16 rebounds and two blocks . Josh Richardson played well off the bench , collecting 14 points , five rebounds and five assists . The Heat will look to keep rolling on Friday against the Indiana Pacers .

The Lakers ( 9 - 7 ) checked in to the contest short - handed , as both Rudy Gay ( hip ) and Duncan ( calf ) were sidelined for their first consecutive contest . The Orlando Magic defeated the Miami Heat , 105 - 90 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday . The Magic ( 9 - 12 ) embarked on their current road trip as losers of four in a row , and appeared like a team in disarray all the way around . However , they 've found a way to turn things around away from the confines of Amway Center , as they 've now managed to rattle off victories in four of their last five games , including three straight . Aaron Gordon led the way for the Magic with 20 points , while Nikola Vucevic posted a 19 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Evan Fournier was next with 13 points of his own , which he supplemented with two rebounds and a steal . No other member of the starting five tallied double digits in the scoring column , but Orlando shot just 44 percent from the field overall , and 50 percent from three - point range . Justise Winslow and Dwyane Wade led the way for the visitors with a pair of 14 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists and two blocks , and the latter registering five boards and two assists . Dwyane Wade was right behind him with 11 points , four assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . James Johnson was productive as a reserve as well with 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Magic head back home to face the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday night , while the Heat head to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Friday evening as well .
The Miami Heat defeated the Houston Rockets , 101 - 99 , at American Airlines Arena on Thursday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Miami blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 37 - 9 run spanning between the second and third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung an 11 - point lead for Houston into a 19 - point lead for Miami . Three-point shooting was the decisive statistic , with the Heat going 9 - of - 39 , while Houston went 18 - of - 54 . Rebounding was decisive as well , with Miami winning that battle , 61 - 41 . Free-throw shooting really killed Houston , as they went just 23 - of - 30 from the charity stripe . The Heat ( 14 - 16 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Rockets is just what they need to get going . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 27 - 31 in the first quarter alone . The Sacramento Kings defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 104 - 99 , at Golden 1 Center on Monday . The outcome of the back - and - forth tussle was not certain even after the clock hit double zeros , as a three - pointer at the buzzer by Patty Bogdanović was reviewed on instant replay before being waved off for having failed to beat the clock . The last - second turn of events secured only the fifth victory of the season for the Kings ( 8 - 6 ) , which shot over 44 percent from the field and turned the ball over just 15 times in the contest . The visitors also shot 50 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range , while also eliciting 15 turnovers from their over - matched hosts . DeMar DeRozan once again led the way for the Spurs with 23 points , which he supplemented with two assists , two rebounds and one steal . Rudy Gay and LaMarcus Aldridge followed with a pair of 14 - point efforts , with the former also supplying nine rebounds and a block and the latter supplying seven rebounds , seven assists , two steals and three blocks . Derrick White supplied 11 points , five boards , five assists and a steal . Nemanja Bjelica led the bench with 12 points , six rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Spurs head back home to face the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday night , while the Spurs head to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Friday evening as well .

Defense was key for the Magic , as they held the Knicks to 35 percent from the field and 18 percent from three - point range . Orlando also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 52 - 54 . The Knicks ( 6 - 7 ) continue to struggle and results like this are downright ugly . Terrence Ross led the way for New York , as he tallied 22 points , two rebounds and three assists on 8 - of - 12 shooting off the bench . Enes Kanter recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 21 points and 15 rebounds . Enes Kanter was a nice spark off the bench , providing 16 points and 15 rebounds . Evan Fournier was the only Knicks starter to play well , as he amassed 12 points , two rebounds and four assists . The Knicks will host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday for their next game . New York ( 6 - 7 ) got some great performances from their stud players , but it simply was n't enough with a lack of production from their `` others `` . Kevin Knox led the team in scoring , as he dropped 17 points on 4 - of - 11 shooting off the bench . Nikola Vucevic led the team in scoring , as he accrued 21 points and two rebounds off the bench . Mario Hezonja led the bench with 12 points , while Trey Burke led the bench with 12 points . On deck for New York is a home matchup against the Washington Wizards on Wednesday .
The host Portland Trail Blazers defeated the visiting New York Knicks on Tuesday , 118 - 114 . Portland ( 12 - 5 ) has been devastated by injuries midway through the season . Stars Ron Lin ( hamstring ) and Derrick Rose ( knee ) sat out the contest , while Portland sits at the bottom of the NBA standings . For the second straight game , All-Star forward Tim Hardaway Jr. was the only starter to score in double digits for the team . The team shot over 56 percent from the field and knocked down almost 71 percent of its free - throws on the night . New York ( 4 - 14 ) , meanwhile , has now won four of its last five after a horrendous start to the season that had seated them at last in the Western Conference . On Tuesday , the team saw the return of star point guard Damian Lillard ( ankle ) on Thursday to lead the team . McCollum stuffed the stat sheet with 29 points , four rebounds , and two assists . Point guard Emmanuel Mudiay also contributed a solid 16 points and four three - pointers , but shot a respectable 6 - of - 9 from the field and 2 - of - 4 from behind the arc . As a team , the Knicks shot a respectable 51 percent from the field and drained 13 three - pointers . The Knicks ( 4 - 14 ) , meanwhile , saw abysmal play from their own backcourt . Shooting guard C.J McCollum led the team with 31 points on 13 - of - 23 shooting , including five three - pointers .
The New York Knicks defeated the host New Orleans Pelicans , 114 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Friday . While there were only five ties and five lead changes in total , this game was close throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 7 points , as it came down to the final seconds . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Knicks going 12 - of - 33 and the Pelicans hitting just 7 - of - 28 from long distance . New York actually dominated the rebounding , as they lost that battle , 55 - 55 . New Orleans ( 10 - 9 ) got some great performances from their stud players , but it simply was n't enough with a lack of production from their `` others `` . Emmanuel Mudiay led the team in scoring , as he tallied 27 points , six rebounds and two assists on 10 - of - 20 shooting . Jrue Holiday was the only other Pelican to reach double figures in scoring , as he tallied 22 points , five rebounds , three assists and three steals off the bench . The Knicks will look to play better on Saturday , when they host the Washington Wizards . New York ( 6 - 9 ) has struggled mightily recently , but losses like this against elite teams have to be encouraging despite the result . Anthony Davis did all he could , as he led the team with 33 points , 11 rebounds and four assists on 12 - of - 19 from the field . Jrue Holiday was second on the team , finishing with 22 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Julius Randle was the only other Pelican in double figures , collecting 13 points , 11 rebounds and five assists . New York will look to keep rolling on Sunday in a home matchup versus the Memphis Grizzlies .

The Knicks dominated this game in this game , as they led by 43 points at the half and held the Bucks to just 78 points in that 33 - minute stretch . The Knicks also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Milwaukee , despite committing six less turnovers . The Bucks ( 15 - 7 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Bucks is just what they need to get going . Eric Bledsoe led the way for Milwaukee , as he tallied 27 points , five rebounds , seven assists and two steals . The Atlanta Hawks defeated the New York Knicks 114 - 107 Friday at Madison Square Garden . Things looked to be going smoothly for the Hawks ( 8 - 23 ) , as they managed to hold a comfortable lead throughout the first three quarters of Friday 's contest . However , a short Knicks ' spurt in the final period ultimately tied the game at 97 . In the end , Atlanta dominated the final two quarters , outscoring the Knicks ( 9 - 25 ) 27 - 20 in the third quarter . Kent Bazemore led the way for the Hawks , putting up a team - high 22 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting from the field and 3 - of - 6 shooting from behind the arc . As a team , the Hawks managed to shoot a scorching 47 percent from the field and 34 percent from three , but it was n't enough to overcome their poor shooting , as the Knicks shot just 30 percent from three - point range ( 10 - of - 27 ) from the field . Kevin Knox was the only other New York player to score in double figures , finishing with 16 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting in 32 minutes . The win pushes Atlanta to just a half game behind the Pistons for third place in the Eastern Conference standings , owning tiebreakers over both Indiana and Charlotte with just 12 games left on the schedule . The Knicks were led by rookie Emmanuel Mudiay , who scored a game - high 32 points on 12 - of - 20 shooting from the field , including three three - pointers , one assist , one rebound , and one three - pointer in 34 minutes . The only other Cavalier to score double - digit points was Paul Mudiay , who scored a game - high 32 points in 30 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Hawks will stay home Tuesday and take on the Pistons , while the Knicks will head home Sunday to play the Bucks .

The Indiana Pacers defeated the New York Knicks , 121 - 106 , at Madison Square Garden on Friday . The Pacers ( 28 - 14 ) came in to Friday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Pacers ( 28 - 14 ) built a 62 - 52 lead by halftime . The second half was much tighter , but Indiana eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Pacers shot an excellent 52 percent from the field overall and a 46 percent tally from three - point range . The Knicks were led by a pair of 22 - point efforts from Victor Oladipo and Domantas Mudiay , with the former adding six rebounds , six assists and a steal , and the latter supplying six rebounds and three assists . Bojan Bogdanovic was next with 15 points , two rebounds , an assist and a steal . Noah Vonleh tallied 12 points , three rebounds , two steals and a block . Darren Collison was productive in a reserve role as well with seven points , 10 assists , five rebounds , a steal and a block . Domantas O'Quinn paced the bench with a 14 - point , 2 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and four steals . The Pacers head back home to face off with the Phoenix Suns on Tuesday , while the Knicks head to New York to take on the 76ers on Sunday evening .

The Thunder shot much better than the Knicks , going 54 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 45 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also forced the Knicks into 12 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . The Thunder were led by Paul George , who went 9 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points . He also had four rebounds and four assists , doing a little bit of everything for the Thunder in this one . He 's now averaging 18 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Westbrook , on the other hand , finished with 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 10 rebounds and nine assists in 28 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds . Notching a double - double , Steven Adams finished with 10 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and seven rebounds in just 29 minutes . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Houston Rockets on Wednesday .

The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 24 - 20 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Mavericks also shot very well , going 54 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 41 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were also able to force the Knicks into 28 turnovers , while committing only 18 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Mavericks were led by Harrison Barnes , who went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 19 points , while also adding four rebounds and a pair of assists . It was his second impressive performance in a row , as he 's combined for 45 points and 31 rebounds over his last two games . Matthews on the other hand shot 6 - for - 11 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from beyond the arc to score 17 points . It was a season - high in points for him , as he 's only averaging 10 points per game so far this season . Luka Dennis Schroder was also a huge factor in the win , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) , 10 rebounds and a steal . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 17 points , while shooting 54 percent from the field . Dirk Nowitzki shot 5 - for - 7 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 14 points . It was his second straight game with 14 points . The only other Knick to reach triple figures in points was Allonzo Allonzo . The Mavericks ' next game will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Boston Celtics on Thursday .

The Pistons got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 36 - 28 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Pistons shot the ball well , going 47 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went just 40 percent from the floor and a meager 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were also able to force the Knicks into 15 turnovers , while committing only 9 of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . It marked his third straight game surpassing the 19 - point mark , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points per game . The Toronto Raptors defeated the New York Knicks , 104 - 99 , at Madison Square Garden on Saturday . The Raptors ( 10 - 16 ) checked in to Saturday as one of the hottest teams in the league , having won seven of their last nine contests . However , the light has seemingly come on for Toronto , and the Knicks ( 10 - 45 ) looked like viable candidates to facilitate an extension of that streak . Toronto wasted no time in establishing the tone , jumping out to a 25 - 23 lead after one quarter . However , the Knicks ( 41 - 45 ) regrouped at halftime and came out firing in the third , outscoring their hosts by a 28 - 28 margin in the final 14 minutes . However , the Raptors made a concerted effort to clamp down in the second half , a strategy that was largely effective as evidenced by the 38 and 40 percent tallies from the field and three - point range , respectively . Kevin Lowry and Kyle Lowry led the way for the Raptors with matching 22 - point efforts , with the former adding 4 rebounds , four assists and two steals , and the latter hauling in four boards , dishing out two assists and recording two steals . Serge Ibaka had a near double - double with 15 points , 13 rebounds , four assists and one block . Kawhi Leonard was just short of a double - double with 11 points , five boards , six assists and one steal . Norman Powell was productive in a reserve role as well with 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . Kyle Lowry paced the Raptors with 22 points , four rebounds , five assists , two blocks and two steals . Serge Ibaka was next with 15 points , 13 rebounds , four assists and one steal . DeAndre Jordan posted a 10 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . Norman Powell led the second unit with 14 points , one rebound and three assists , while Dennis Schroder filled out the stat sheet with 13 points , six assists , four rebounds and three steals . The Raptors head back home to face the Brooklyn Nets on Monday night , while the Knicks head to Cleveland to take on the Cavaliers on Monday evening as well .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Knicks , 126 - 67 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . In a battle between two of the worst offenses in the NBA , the two teams left it all on the floor in this overtime thriller . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Sixers recording 33 assists to 15 turnovers , while New York committed 12 turnovers to match their 23 assists . Three-point shooting was a big factor as well , with Philly hitting 8 - of - 23 , while the Knicks went just 1 - of - 13 from long range . The 76ers ( 10 - 47 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break with some fury . Joel Embiid was the player of the game , as he tallied 26 points , 14 rebounds and three assists . Tobias Harris was second on the team , finishing with 25 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jimmy Butler provided 13 points , seven rebounds , eight assists , three steals and two blocks . On deck for the Sixers is a road matchup against the Atlanta Hawks on Thursday . Defense was key for New York , as they held the Spurs to 45 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The Spurs also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 14 more assists and committing six less turnovers . The Spurs ( 33 - 28 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . The Orlando Magic defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 111 - 106 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . However , they 've found a way to turn things around away from the confines of Amway Center , as they 've now managed to rattle off victories in four of their last five games , including three straight . Redick was next with 22 points , six rebounds and six assists . Jimmy Butler was next with 14 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Orlando Magic defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 130 - 117 , at Amway Center on Saturday . In a battle between two teams fighting for nothing more than ping pong balls , both teams played a hard - fought game . In fact , there were eight ties and 10 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Magic going 11 - of - 26 and the Timberwolves hitting 10 - of - 26 . Minnesota also dominated the shooting , hitting 54 percent of their shots to Minnesota 's 46 percent . The Magic also took care of the glass , winning the rebounding battle , 41 - 43 . The Magic ( 25 - 29 ) have now lost 12 of their last 13 games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for Minnesota , as he tallied 27 points and 11 rebounds on 12 - of - 16 from the field . Andrew Wiggins was n't far behind , totaling 23 points , nine rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks . Nikola Vucevic was a huge spark off the bench , as he totaled 21 points , six rebounds and three assists . Taj Gibson was the only other Minnesota player in double figures , as he totaled 10 points and four rebounds . Orlando 's next game is on Saturday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Bucks . Orlando ( 25 - 29 ) desperately needed this win with their playoff hopes slimming and this win showed some serious resiliency . Karl-Anthony Towns was the player of the game , as he collected 27 points , 11 rebounds and five assists on 12 - of - 16 shooting . Andrew Wiggins finished second on the team with 23 points , nine rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks . Evan Fournier amassed 18 points and two rebounds . Dario Saric provided 17 points and eight rebounds . Orlando will play the New Orleans Pelicans on Saturday for their next game .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 127 - 89 , in overtime Thursday at Amway Center . The Magic ( 27 - 32 ) came into Thursday 's contest on the second night of a back - to - back after suffering a 128 - 120 loss to the Cavaliers on Tuesday . Terrence Ross ( back ) made his return to the starting lineup after missing three games , and he was moved into the starting lineup in his stead . Ross finished with 21 points on 6 - of - 15 shooting in 21 minutes off the bench . It was the first time since Feb. 13 that he failed to reach double figures in scoring . The Hornets were led by Terrence Ross , who scored a team - high 21 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting in 24 minutes off the bench . In the end , six different Orlando players managed to score in double figures as the team shot the lights out Thursday night . As a team , the Magic shot 52 percent from the field and 44 percent from three , while the Magic shot just 35 percent from the field and 13 percent from behind the arc . As for the Hornets ( 27 - 30 ) , the loss ends a brief two - game winning streak for the team . For the Hornets , they continue to struggle , as they have now won two in a row after a four - game losing streak . They were also led by the duo of Kemba Walker and Nikola Vucevic , as they combined for 73 points on the night . Ross finished with 21 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting to go along with a rebound and two assists . Vucevic , on the other hand , scored 15 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting to go along with 11 rebounds , as he continues to be one of the hottest players for the Hornets all season .

It was a season - high in points for Gordon , who had n't reached the 10 - point mark yet this season . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 21 rebounds over his last two games . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Saturday .

Warren and Harrison Barnes . Warren went 7 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding seven rebounds . He 's now averaging 17 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Jackson , on the other hand , went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding three assists . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big reason for the Mavericks recent success . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Brooklyn recording four more assists than the Wizards , while committing nine less turnovers . The Brooklyn Nets ( 28 - 24 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 11 - 40 ) 122 - 117 on Tuesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 20 - 19 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Nets also shot very well , going 45 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 50 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were also able to force the Bulls into 19 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Nets were led by Zach LaVine , who went 11 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 26 points , while also adding five assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 40 rebounds over his last two games . Parker , on the other hand , went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding nine rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 15 points and 10 rebounds on the year . Both Rondae Hollis-Jefferson ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) and Rondae Hollis-Jefferson ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) each had 18 points as well . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday , while the Bulls will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

Portland also dominated the shooting , hitting 44 percent of their shots , while holding Brooklyn to just 39 percent from the field . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Nets going 12 - of - 33 and the Nuggets hitting just 5 - of - 18 from long distance . Brooklyn also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 42 - 54 . Denver also took advantage of the whistle , going 28 - of - 42 from the free - throw line . D'Angelo Russell led the way for Denver , as he tallied 23 points , four rebounds and five assists on 7 - of - 14 from the field . Jarrett Allen was second on the team , as he accrued 18 points , nine rebounds , two assists and five blocks . Paul Millsap recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 11 rebounds . The Nuggets ( 9 - 3 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break with some fury . D'Angelo Russell led the way , as he tallied 23 points , four rebounds , five assists and two steals . Jarrett Allen was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 18 points , nine rebounds and five blocks . Caris LeVert started and amassed 15 points , two rebounds and five assists . Spencer Dinwiddie led the bench , amassing 12 points , six rebounds and six assists .

The second - year big man was aided by Nikola Jokic 's team - high 20 points , which he complemented with six rebounds , six assists , a steal and a block . It was a remarkable night from the three - point shooting , as Middleton drained five of his eight attempts from beyond the arc . Meanwhile , the Nuggets ( 9 - 4 ) were led by Brook Lopez , who went for a game - high 28 points , along with four rebounds , an assist , two steals and two blocks . Khris Middleton tallied 21 points , five rebounds and two assists , and went 8 - of - 12 from the field , including 3 - of - 5 from behind the arc . Eric Bledsoe filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , three assists , eight rebounds , three steals and a block . Malcolm Brogdon posted 20 points , five assists , six rebounds and two steals . In fact , the Nuggets finished the game on a 27 - 6 run over the second and third quarter and never looked back . Shooting was key , as the Nuggets shot 56 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range . His replacement , Mason Plumlee , played just 16 minutes and scored 11 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting to go along with nine rebounds . As a team , Dallas shot just 47 percent from the field and made 15 free throws , compared to Dallas 's eight . The Denver Nuggets defeated the Miami Heat , 103 - 87 , at Pepsi Center on Monday . In a battle between two teams fighting for nothing more than ping pong balls , both teams played a hard - fought game . In fact , there were six ties and 16 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . Denver took care of business in the fourth quarter , outscoring Miami , 29 - 21 . Rebounding was a huge factor , with the Nuggets winning that battle , 45 - 47 . Denver also took advantage of the whistle , going 11 - of - 13 from the free - throw line . Miami ( 25 - 30 ) played this game without Duncan and Robinson , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to compete with the Nuggets . Justise Winslow led the way for Miami , as he tallied 15 points , four rebounds and two steals . James Johnson was second on the team , accruing 14 points , six rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Paul Millsap was the only other Nugget in double figures , as he provided 9 points , six rebounds , two assists , two steals and three blocks . Miami will look to keep rolling on Wednesday against the Sacramento Kings . Denver ( 25 - 18 ) had to play this game without Duncan and Dwyane Wade , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Justise Winslow was the player of the game , as he collected 15 points , four rebounds and two steals on 6 - of - 16 shooting . James Johnson finished second on the team with 14 points , six rebounds , two assists and three blocks , while Paul Millsap accumulated just nine points , 10 rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Josh Richardson was a huge spark off the bench , providing 12 points and a rebound .
The Denver Nuggets ( 39 - 18 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 30 - 27 ) 120 - 118 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 45 percent from the floor and just 34 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets were also able to force the Kings into 28 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . The Nuggets were led by Paul Millsap , who went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 25 points , while also adding 13 rebounds over 30 minutes . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 19 points and 19 rebounds . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Marvin Bagley who finished with 20 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and 18 rebounds in 36 minutes . It marked his first double - double over his last four games , a stretch where he 's averaging 13 points and 10 assists . The only other King in double figures was Bogdan Ilyasova , who posted 16 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and four rebounds in 26 minutes . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Thursday .

In fact , neither team led by more than 8 points , as it came down to the final seconds . Rebounding was key for the Nuggets , as they lost that battle , 56 - 38 . Free-throw shooting really killed the Clippers too , as they went 33 - of - 35 , while the Nuggets hit just 33 - of - 37 from the charity stripe . The Nuggets ( 41 - 18 ) have now lost seven of their last eight games , as they continue to add to the record books . Lou Williams led the way for Los Angeles , as he tallied 24 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals on 6 - of - 15 shooting . Paul Millsap finished second on the team , totaling 21 points , 16 rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks . JaMychal Green amassed 13 points and nine rebounds . The Denver Nuggets ( 42 - 18 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 38 - 22 ) 121 - 112 on Tuesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 29 - 26 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Nuggets also shot very well , going 47 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 45 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets also forced the Thunder into 17 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . The Nuggets were led by Nikola Jokic , who went 11 - for - 25 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 36 points , while also adding nine rebounds and a blocked shot as well . Jokic came just short of a double - double on the season with 22 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 10 - 13 FT ) , nine rebounds and 10 assists . The double - double was his second in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 35 assists over his last two games . Jamal Murray came off the bench for 20 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt ) , five rebounds and five assists in 32 minutes . Since joining the Thunder at the trade deadline , he 's averaged 18 points , 4 rebounds , 4 assists and 0 steals over his last three games . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Thursday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Thursday .

The Jazz ( 35 - 19 ) shot 44 percent from the field , as all five starters scored in double digits to lead the way . Rudy Gobert was the high - point man with 16 points , eight rebounds and four blocks , while Will Barton double - doubled with 21 points and 13 rebounds . Paul Millsap was the only other Jazz player to score in double figures , as he chipped in 15 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . The Nuggets ( 42 - 19 ) were led by Jamal Murray , who scored a team - high 21 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with four assists and four rebounds in 32 minutes . Kyle Korver added 22 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , including 6 - of - 10 from deep . Rudy Gobert was solid in the middled , as he hauled in 8 rebounds , to go along with 16 points , eight rebounds , four blocks and one assist , in 31 minutes of action .

The Pelicans ' next game will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Monday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the San Antonio Spurs on Monday .

The Indiana Pacers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 97 - 89 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Saturday . Indiana got out to a hot start early and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers led by 32 at the half , as they never relinquished the lead from there . Defense was key for Indiana , as they held Atlanta to 36 percent from the field ( 31 - of - 87 ) and 28 percent from three - point range ( 12 - of - 29 ) . The Pacers shot 40 percent from the field , 71 percent from the free - throw line and 28 percent from three - point range . The Pacers shot just 40 percent from the field and 28 percent from long distance . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Indiana winning that battle , 53 - 41 . Jeremy Lin led the team in scoring , as he tallied 16 points , four rebounds and four assists off the bench . Myles Turner was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 10 points and 10 rebounds on 4 - of - 11 shooting . Dewayne Dedmon led the team in scoring off the bench , as he scored 12 points on 4 - of - 5 shooting . Indiana will look to bounce back on Monday , when they host the Los Angeles Clippers for their next game . Indianapolis ( 10 - 6 ) has been playing some great ball recently , but heartbreaking losses like this are par for the course for such a young team . Myles Turner did all he could to keep the Hawks hanging around , as he accumulated 10 points , 10 rebounds and two assists in the defeat . Atlanta is off until Monday , when they host the Los Angeles Jazz for their next game .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Utah Jazz , 121 - 94 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . Indiana were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . In fact , the Pacers pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 78 - plus minutes . Defense was key for the Pacers , as they held the Jazz to 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range . The Pacers also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Utah , while committing three less turnovers . The Pacers ( 11 - 6 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Jazz is just what they need to get going . Bojan Bogdanovic was the player of the game , scoring a career - high 21 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Domantas Sabonis provided 19 points , nine rebounds and nine assists of his own . Jae Crowder was second on the team in scoring , dropping 14 points and five rebounds . Darren Collison was the only other Utah player in double figures , accumulating 14 points , six rebounds and seven assists . On deck for Utah is a road matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 11 - 6 ) had to play this game without Kyle O'Quinn and that was simply too much to overcome against a hot Jazz team . Bojan Bogdanovic led the team in scoring , totaling 21 points and two rebounds on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Rudy Gobert recorded a double - double , totaling 12 points and 11 rebounds . Jae Crowder was second on the team , scoring 14 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting . Myles Turner accumulated 12 points , six rebounds , four assists , two steals and three blocks . On deck for the Jazz is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .

The Indiana Pacers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 96 - 90 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Tuesday . Indiana needed this game to keep playoff hopes alive and they rode a furious comeback to increase their odds . In fact , after trailing by 11 at the half , the Pacers outscored the Bulls , 68 - 35 , in the second half to pull away . Rebounding was a huge factor , with the Pacers winning that battle , 45 - 44 . Indiana also dominated the shooting , hitting 46 percent of their shots to Indiana 's 39 percent . The Pacers also took care of the glass , winning the rebounding differential , 45 - 42 . The Bulls ( 5 - 20 ) have been struggling recently , but a road win against the Pacers is just what the doctor ordered . Darren Collison was the player of the game , as he led the team with 23 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Myles Turner was n't far behind , as he totaled 18 points , 11 rebounds and five blocks . Bojan Bogdanovic was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 14 points , six rebounds and two assists . Indiana will look to keep rolling on Friday against the Orlando Pacers . The Golden State Warriors ( 36 - 14 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 32 - 17 ) 132 - 100 on Monday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . The Warriors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Pacers 40 - 22 in the first quarter alone . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 54 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Pacers went just 43 percent from the floor and 40 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were also able to force the Pacers into 29 turnovers , while committing only 12 of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . The Warriors ' backcourt duo of Stephen Curry and Kevin Durant did it again Monday . Curry went 10 - for - 13 from the field and 6 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding three assists . It was his second impressive performance in a row , as he 's combined for 49 points and 30 rebounds over his last two outings . Durant , on the other hand , finished with 16 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) of his own , to go along with three rebounds and a steal . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 77 points and 13 assists over his last two games . The Warriors also saw some solid contributions off the bench . Aaron Holiday chipped in with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt ) and four assists as well . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Philadelphia 76ers on Thursday , while the Pacers will be at home against the Washington Wizards on Wednesday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 136 - 94 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Tuesday . The Pacers ( 35 - 19 ) came in to Tuesday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but it was n't for their lack of effort that carried them to a win against the Lakers ( 27 - 27 ) . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the way for the Pacers ( 35 - 19 ) with 24 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , including 4 - of - 10 from behind the arc . Myles Turner was n't too far behind , scoring 22 points in just 22 minutes , while Thaddeus Young recorded a double - double of 12 points and 11 rebounds in just 24 minutes . As a team , the Pacers were hot from behind the arc , hitting 19 of their 34 shots from long range ( 56 percent ) , and they ended up needing every last one of them . As for the Lakers , it was a night to forget , as the team shot 47 percent from the field and a 56 percent from behind the arc . As for the Lakers ( 27 - 27 ) , they 've now dropped two straight games after rattling off three straight victories , as the absence of Nikola Jokic ( hip ) has really taken a tole on this team . His replacement , Rajon Rondo , managed to record just three points on 1 - of - 3 shooting and zero rebounds in 35 minutes . The Lakers will face the Celtics on Thursday , while the Pacers will face the Clippers in Indianapolis .

However , a standout effort from James Harden led the Pistons ( 9 - 7 ) to the tune of a season - high 33 points , which he complemented with a pair of rebounds and a block . The second - year big man was aided by Blake Griffin 's 28 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds and four assists . Chris Paul and Clint Capela followed with matching 20 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and nine assists , and the latter supplying four rebounds , an assist and three blocks . Clint Capela followed with a 29 - point , 21 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , three blocks and two steals . Jackson was right behind him with 22 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . P.J . Tucker provided a bench - leading 11 points that he supplemented with eight boards , two assists and one steal . Glenn Robinson III went for 10 points , two rebounds and one steal . Reggie Bullock supplied eight points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Rockets next head to Cleveland to take on the Cavaliers on Saturday night , while the Rockets head to Detroit to take on the Suns on Sunday evening .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns on Sunday , 118 - 107 . Detroit ( 10 - 7 ) saw strong play from sophomore Devin Booker in the win . Booker led the team with 37 points on 14 - of - 24 shooting and came away with a team - high four rebounds . The game was a turnaround for the veteran star , as he posted only five points in the loss . The team shot a stellar 46 percent from the field and drained 16 three - pointers on the night . Phoenix ( 4 - 15 ) is in the midst of a midseason crisis , as the team has now gone just 3 - 6 in its last ten games . The Suns were led by Devin Booker , who scored a season - high 37 points on 14 - of - 24 shooting . It was a season - best night for Suns , however , as he shot 14 - of - 24 from the field and 3 - of - 9 from three - point range . It was an off night for the team as a whole , as Phoenix hit just 71 percent of its shots from beyond the arc . Phoenix ( 4 - 15 ) , meanwhile , has now lost two in a row after a hot start to the season . On Sunday , the team saw a fairly respectable offensive night but a miserable defensive one . The Suns shot over 51 percent and hit 8 three - pointers . Shooting guard Devin Booker led the team with 37 points , including three three - pointers .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the New York Knicks , 115 - 108 , in overtime at American Airlines Center on Tuesday . These are two teams that have struggled on the defensive end this season and it was clearly evident here in this 252 - point game . The Detroit offense was lights - out , as they shot 48 percent from the field , 71 percent from the free - throw line and 29 percent from three - point range . The second quarter was the difference in the game , with the Pistons outscoring the Knicks , 27 - 24 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Pistons recording 20 assists to 13 turnovers , while the Knicks committed 13 turnovers to 16 assists . The Knicks ( 7 - 15 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break with some fury . Blake Griffin led the way , as he tallied 30 points , four rebounds and five assists . Stanley Johnson was second on the team , as he provided 21 points , four rebounds and three assists off the bench . Reggie Jackson finished with 21 points , three rebounds and four assists , while Reggie Jackson accumulated 21 points , three rebounds and four assists . Detroit 's next game will be on Wednesday against the Chicago Bulls . The Knicks ( 7 - 15 ) continue to be one of the disappointments of the league , as they melted down in their own building . Blake Griffin led the team in scoring , as he tallied 30 points , 27 rebounds and five assists on 9 - of - 21 shooting . Reggie Jackson was second on the team , with his 21 points , three rebounds and four assists . Reggie Jackson had a nice all - around game , collecting 21 points , three rebounds and four assists . Enes Kanter was a nice spark off the bench , providing 16 points and 14 rebounds . On deck for the Pistons is a road matchup against the Chicago Bulls on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Chicago Bulls , 107 - 88 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . It 's rare to see Chicago dominated in their home building , but that was just the case here in this near wire - to - wire win for Detroit . The Pistons actually led by at least 34 points for the entirety of the second half , as the final 13 - point margin was their largest lead of the game . Detroit was lights - out from the field , shooting 45 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Detroit winning that battle , 52 - 40 . The Pistons also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Chicago , while committing three less turnovers . The Pistons ( 12 - 7 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Bulls is just what the doctor ordered . Reggie Jackson did all he could for Chicago , as he led the team with 20 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Blake Griffin accumulated 20 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double , totaling 19 points , 20 rebounds , two steals and four blocks . On deck for the Pistons is a road matchup with the Golden State Warriors on Saturday . The Bulls ( 5 - 18 ) had to play this game without Paul Millsap ( thigh ) , but they simply did n't have enough bullets to win this fight . Blake Griffin was the player of the game , as he collected 20 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Jabari Parker was n't far behind , totaling 12 points and six rebounds . Robin Lopez was the only other starter in double figures , totaling eight points and two rebounds . Chicago 's next game is on Saturday , as they play the Houston Rockets on the road .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Golden State Warriors 111 - 102 Saturday at Spectrum Center . The Pistons ( 13 - 7 ) were able to pull out a victory in the season series against the Warriors ( 15 - 9 ) . They entered the fourth quarter with a six - point lead , but the Pistons ( 13 - 9 ) were able to pull away late in the fourth quarter . From there , it was all Stephen Curry for the Warriors , as they shot 44 percent from the field and recorded 22 assists . Stephen Curry led the way with a poor shooting night , scoring 27 points on 10 - of - 21 shooting from the field and 3 - of - 9 shooting from behind the arc . He also had five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Klay Thompson added 21 points of his own , while Reggie Jackson had a solid night of his own , recording 17 points , five assists and two rebounds in 26 minutes . As a team , the Pistons were hot from behind the arc , hitting 12 of their 35 shots from long range ( 34 percent ) , and they ended up needing every last one of them . As for the Warriors , they did not have the same success from the field , as the team shot just 46 percent from the field and 23 percent from behind the arc . Blake Griffin was one of the lone bright spots for Golden State , as he posted a game - high 26 points on 9 - of - 22 shooting from the field and 2 - of - 9 shooting from long range in 34 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded yet another double - double , posting 16 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting and 19 rebounds in 33 minutes . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double of 16 points and 19 rebounds in 33 minutes , while Stanley Johnson added 19 points and seven rebounds of his own . The Warriors will head to Oklahoma City to take on the Hawks on Monday , while the Warriors will go on the road to Detroit to play the Thunder on Monday .

This game meant much more to the Thunder than the Pistons and they were lucky to escape with a win . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Oklahoma City winning that battle , 52 - 41 . The Pistons ( 13 - 8 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Pistons is just what they need to get going . Blake Griffin was the player of the game , as he collected 20 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Paul George was n't far behind , finishing with 17 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and two steals . Jon Leuer was the only other player in double figures , as he dropped 12 points and four rebounds on 4 - of - 7 shooting . The Pistons will look to play better on Wednesday , when they host the Milwaukee Bucks for their next game .
