The Detroit Pistons ( 19 - 24 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 25 ) 120 - 115 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Detroit . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 26 - 34 in the first quarter alone . They were the superior shooters in this game as well , going 48 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 50 percent from the floor and 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons also forced the Magic into 11 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . The Pistons were led by Blake Griffin , who went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 30 points , while also adding four rebounds and five assists . He 's now pushed his season averages to 11 points and 2 rebounds per game on the year . Nikola Vucevic also had a strong showing , recording 24 points ( 11 - 22 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . Luke Kennard was the other big contributor off the bench , as he went 6 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 14 points in 25 minutes . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .

The Pistons shot the ball well , going 52 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went 50 percent from the floor and 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were also able to force the Wizards into 19 turnovers , while committing only 16 of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . The Pistons were led by Andre Drummond , who double - doubled with 32 points ( 12 - 19 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and 17 rebounds . He was coming off a 35 - point showing on Monday , so it was good to see him turn things around . It was the first time he 's surpassed the 14 - point mark this season , so it was a nice surprise for the Wizards . However , Toronto roared back in the third quarter by outscoring Washington by a 26 - 44 margin over the final 11 minutes to secure the double - digit win . The Wizards ( 24 - 34 ) decisively erased a 30 - 30 first - quarter deficit by outscoring Washington by a 27 - 11 margin in the third quarter before sealing the deal with an impressive 26 - point fourth period . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards with 28 points , a total he complemented with 11 assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block . OG shooting guard Jeff Green was next with a bench - leading 23 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Trevor Ariza and Norman Powell followed with matching 19 - point efforts , with the former adding eight rebounds , six assists and one steal , and the latter providing four rebounds and four assists . Norman Powell drew the start and produced 11 points , four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Danny Green and Danny Green supplied a pair of 10 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and one steal and the latter supplying four rebounds and one steal . The Wizards head back home to face the San Antonio Spurs on Friday evening , while the Wizards head to Toronto to take on the Hornets on Friday evening as well .
The Toronto Raptors ( 44 - 16 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 33 - 27 ) 120 - 117 on Friday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially San Antonio , as they shot 48 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . The Raptors also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 48 boards to the Spurs 48 . The three - point shooting was a huge difference as well , with Toronto going 14 - for - 30 while the Spurs went 12 - for - 37 . San Antonio also forced the Spurs into 14 turnovers , while committing just nine of their own . The problem for the Raptors was the rebounding , as they snatched down 47 boards to the Spurs 48 . San Antonio has been throttling teams , but this was easily their worst offensive performance of the year . No player scored more than 21 points and no player scored more than 25 . DeMar DeRozan led the team with 23 points and eight assists , while going 8 - for - 12 from the field . Danny Green was second on the team , as he scored 17 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting . On deck for San Antonio is a matchup with the New York Knicks on Sunday . Toronto continues to thrive at home and this sort of win shows how scary they can be . DeMar DeRozan once again led the team with 23 points , as he shot 7 - for - 12 from the field . Kyle Lowry was the only other player with more than 16 points , as he collected 17 points , three rebounds and five assists . This was a tough loss for San Antonio , but they 'll look to keep that momentum going against the Orlando Magic on Sunday .

The Toronto Raptors ( 50 - 21 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 14 - 57 ) 128 - 92 on Monday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . The Raptors had a very strong first half Monday , out - scoring the Knicks 38 - 25 . The Raptors made a run in the third quarter though , and went on to out - score the Knicks 27 - 23 in the final quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 56 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went just 33 percent from the floor and 23 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were led by the duo of Allonzo Jeremy Lin and Pascal Siakam . Each recorded a double - double , as Lin finished with 20 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , three rebounds and two assists , while Gasol posted 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds . Gasol had scored 12 points or less in each of his last three games , so it was good to see him get back on track Monday . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Kevin Knox , who finished with 12 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds . The Raptors ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Wednesday , while the Knicks will travel to Utah to play the Jazz on Wednesday .

The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Houston Rockets 131 - 112 at Toyota Center on Wednesday . The Pelicans ( 1 - 0 ) maintained a lead throughout most of the Western Conference clash with the Rockets ( 0 - 1 ) , which included a 21 point lead at the half . Drama ensued down the stretch , started by Eric Gordon , who finished with a team - high 21 points on an efficient 7 - of - 14 shooting from the field in 29 minutes . Nikola Mirotic ( ankle ) made his season debut and did not return , finishing with eight points and eight rebounds in 36 minutes . The Pelicans were led by Eric Gordon , who scored a team - high 21 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting and grabbed one assist in 29 minutes as a reserve . Julius Randle put up a nice line of 25 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting from the field , and grabbed eight rebounds in 23 minutes . As a team , the Pelicans were hot from behind the arc , hitting 10 of their 25 shots from long range ( 40 percent ) , and they ended up needing every last one of them . As for the Rockets , they did not have the same success from the field , as the team shot just 42 percent from the field and 33 percent from behind the arc . Nikola Mirotic was a bright spot for the Pelicans , as he scored 30 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 6 - 8 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and grabbed 10 rebounds in 29 minutes of play . Julius Randle also had a solid showing , posting 25 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , eight rebounds and three assists in 23 minutes . The Pelicans will head to Los Angeles to play the Lakers on Friday , while the Rockets will go on the road to face the Kings on Saturday .

Despite this game being close throughout the first quarter , the Rockets took care of business in dominating fashion . The second quarter was the decisive stretch , with Houston winning that quarter , 21 - 32 . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with the Rockets shooting just 49 percent , while the Hawks could n't crack 49 percent . Atlanta also dominated the shooting , hitting 43 percent of their shots , while holding Atlanta to 41 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was the biggest factor for Houston though , winning that battle , 42 - 38 . The Hawks ( 20 - 41 ) have been climbing back into the playoff hunt recently . but this was a tough task against a hungry Rockets team . It was his second 40 - point outing in his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 25 points , 12 rebounds and 8 assists per game . The Houston Rockets defeated the San Antonio Spurs 136 - 105 at AT & T Center on Friday . The Rockets ( 10 - 11 ) survived a bit of a scare late in Friday 's game , but it was all downhill from there . In fact , the Rockets entered the fourth quarter with a 20 - point lead and never let the Spurs ( 10 - 12 ) get within one point . San Antonio had a chance to tie it up with just under two minutes to go , but LaMarcus Aldridge 's free throws put the Rockets up by one with just under a minute remaining . San Antonio then had a chance to win the game as time expired , sending the game to overtime . From there , the Rockets dominated the final five minutes , outscoring San Antonio by a score of 40 - 27 . Capela 's 27 - point , 12 - rebound double - double led the way for the Rockets , and his effort was n't enough to keep the Rockets in the game . The other San Antonio player 's shooting stroke was not enough , however , as the team shot 50 percent from the field and hit 22 of their 54 attempts from beyond the arc . For San Antonio , it was a rough night for All-Star Rudy Gay , who shot just 4 - of - 8 from the field for nine points to go along with one assist and four steals . The Spurs will host the Bulls on Sunday , while San Antonio will host the Trail Blazers on Saturday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Portland Trail Blazers at AT & T Center on Sunday , 131 - 118 . LaMarcus Aldridge scored a game - high 20 points on 4 - of - 15 shooting to go along with eight rebounds in 35 minutes . C.J . McCollum added 24 points on 11 - of - 22 shooting , while Al-Farouq Aminu scored 20 points , grabbed nine rebounds and dished out an assist in 36 minutes . The bench was lead by Patty Mills with 15 points , six rebounds and six assists , while Patty Mills added 15 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting including 3 - of - 5 from three - point range . The Spurs shot 11 - of - 15 from behind the arc . They were led by 36 points , eight rebounds and six assists from DeMar DeRozan , who converted 12 - of - 28 field goal attempts . CJ McCollum added 24 points , two rebounds and three assists , while Al-Farouq Aminu poured in 20 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting off the bench . San Antonio shot 60 percent as a team and knocked down 11 - of - 15 three - point attempts . The Trail Blazers ( 13 - 10 ) , on the other hand , shot 52 percent and hit 12 - of - 15 three - point attempts in their loss . The Trail Blazers return home on Tuesday , where they head to Dallas to face the Mavericks . The Spurs have three days off before a three - game homestand against the Jazz .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 133 - 120 , at AT & T Center on Friday . San Antonio were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . In fact , the Spurs pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 37 minutes . Defense was key for the Spurs , as they held the Lakers to 46 percent from the field , 81 percent from the free - throw line and 31 percent from three - point range . San Antonio also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 48 - 43 . The Lakers ( 15 - 10 ) were in a bit of a slide , so a road win against the Lakers is just what the doctor ordered . DeMar DeRozan led the way for Los Angeles , as he tallied 36 points , eight rebounds and nine assists . Kyle Kuzma was second on the team , with his 13 points and four boards . JaVale McGee was huge off the bench , providing 12 points and 12 rebounds . The Lakers will be in action again on Saturday in a road matchup against the Memphis Grizzlies . The Spurs ( 12 - 14 ) have been one of the worst teams in the league over recent weeks and they came out of the All-Star break with some fury . DeMar DeRozan continued his tear , as he led the team with 36 points and eight rebounds . Kyle Kuzma was second on the team , as he accrued 27 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals . Lonzo on deck for Los Angeles is a home matchup against the Memphis Grizzlies on Sunday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Utah Jazz 110 - 97 Sunday at AT & T Center . The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - do n't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was led by DeMar DeRozan , who scored a game - high 26 points on 10 - of - 23 shooting from the field , and he added eight assists , six rebounds , two steals and one block . As a team , it was n't a great shooting night for DeMar DeRozan , who shot 10 - of - 23 from the field , 0 - of - 1 from behind the arc , and he added eight assists and six rebounds to go along with a game - high six steals . As a team , the Spurs were on fire from long range , shooting just 5 - of - 14 from long range and 53 percent from the field overall . Up next , the Spurs will remain home Monday to take on the Suns , while the Jazz will look to crack their first game with the Thunder in Oklahoma City on Feb. 11 . San Antonio will travel to Phoenix to play the Suns on Monday , while the Jazz will travel to Oklahoma City to take on the Thunder , as the Jazz will host the Phoenix Suns on Tuesday in Nerlens Noel 's fourth game in San Antonio .

Dante Cunningham was the only other Phoenix player to score in double figures , putting up 14 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting and grabbing three rebounds . Up next , the Spurs will head home Thursday to take on the Clippers , while the Suns will travel to Dallas on Thursday to play the Mavericks .

The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 96 , at AT & T Center on Monday . The laundry list of superstars who sat out this game is endless , but the Spurs were able to add another win under their belt to come one game closer to the Spurs for that coveted number - one seed in the east . San Antonio got it done with defense , as they held Philadelphia to 41 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was a huge factor as well , with San Antonio recording 28 assists to just six turnovers , while Philadelphia committed 10 turnovers to 29 assists . The 76ers ( 20 - 12 ) had to play this game without Jimmy Butler and Jimmy Curry , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . J.J. Redick carried the load for Philadelphia , as he scored a team - high 16 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting . DeMar DeRozan was n't far behind , finishing with 20 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Joel Embiid recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 11 rebounds . Wilson Chandler was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 10 points , five rebounds and four assists . San Antonio will look to keep rolling on Wednesday against the Orlando Magic . The Sixers ( 20 - 12 ) have been dominant at home this season and a win like this shows just how scary of a team they can be . Rudy Gay was the player of the game , as he amassed 21 points , six rebounds and three assists . Ben Simmons was second on the team , providing 16 points and six rebounds off the bench . Joel Embiid accumulated 13 points , 11 rebounds and five assists . Philadelphia will look to play better on Wednesday in a road matchup with the New York Knicks .

The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - do n't - break mentality the rest of the way . Karl-Anthony Towns added 13 points of his own to go along with six rebounds , four assists , and a steal . As a team , the Spurs were hot from the field , shooting an incredible 58 percent from the field and 58 percent from behind the arc . As for the Timberwolves ( 14 - 18 ) , they have now won two in a row and seven of their last eight . They were led by Bryn Forbes , who put up a game - high 22 points on top of four rebounds and seven assists . DeMar DeRozan added 12 points of his own , but he shot a poor 5 - of - 10 from the field and 0 - of - 0 from behind the arc . As a team , the Timberwolves shot just 40 percent from the field and an impressive 58 percent from behind the arc . Up next , the Spurs will head home Sunday to take on the Rockets , while the Timberwolves will travel to Oklahoma City Saturday to play the Thunder .

Malik Beasley led the way with an efficient 22 points in 30 minutes off the bench for the Nuggets . The San Antonio Spurs ( 21 - 17 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 21 - 15 ) 120 - 111 on Monday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 17 - 23 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Spurs shot the ball well , going 49 percent from the field and 54 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 49 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs also out - rebounded the Celtics 43 - 40 , even furthering their advantage Monday . Rookie Jaylen Brown led the team in scoring off the bench , going 10 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding four rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's had a very strong stretch of three games , where he 's averaging 18 points and 4 rebounds . Notching a double - double , Jayson center Jayson finished with 12 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt ) and nine rebounds in 35 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , combining for 35 points and 18 rebounds over that span . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the season . Coming off the bench , San Antonio was led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with a team - high of 32 points ( 13 - 23 FG , 6 - 7 FT ) , while also adding nine rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his fourth straight game surpassing the 16 - point mark , a stretch where he 's averaged 29 points per game . The only other Celtic to reach double figures in points was Dāvis San Antonio , who went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding four steals and a blocked shot in just 30 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 22 - 17 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 28 - 12 ) 125 - 107 on Thursday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got out to a quick start Thursday , out - scoring the Raptors 38 - 19 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Spurs shot the ball well , going 55 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 45 percent from the floor and just 20 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs also forced the Raptors into 10 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Spurs were led by Kawhi Leonard , who went 8 - for - 13 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 21 points in 33 minutes . He was able to get to the free throw line seven times , and converted on a perfect 5 - of - 7 . The only other Raptor to reach double figures in points was Serge Ibaka , who went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 14 points , while adding six rebounds as well . It was his second straight game with a double - double , as he 's combined for 54 points and 29 assists over his last two games . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday , while the Raptors will travel to Milwaukee to play the Bucks on Saturday .

It was the first time he 's surpassed the 20 - point mark this season , pushing his season average to 12 points per game . It was a near wire - to - wire win for San Antonio , as they led for over 45 minutes of this game , with New Orleans leading by double - digits for the majority of the game . The Spurs offense was on point , as they shot 48 percent from the field and assisted on 29 of their 44 made baskets . They also took care of business at the charity stripe , going 16 - of - 18 from the free - throw line , with New Orleans hitting just 12 - of - 12 . Defense was key for San Antonio , as they held New Orleans to 45 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . The Pelicans ( 23 - 30 ) have now lost 10 of their last 9 games , as they continue to battle the Oklahoma City Thunder for the top - spot in the west . LaMarcus Aldridge was the player of the game , as he collected 25 points , 14 rebounds and two steals . DeMar DeRozan was n't far behind , finishing with 13 points , six rebounds and five assists . The only other player in double figures was Marco Belinelli , who recorded 17 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting off the bench . San Antonio will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Sacramento Kings .

The Sacramento Kings defeated the Phoenix Suns 122 - 105 at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Tuesday . The Kings ( 12 - 11 ) claimed their third straight victory and have won seven of their last eight contests . Buddy Hield had his best game in a Kings uniform , scoring 20 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting , while Buddy Hield added six points on 1 - of - 6 shooting across 22 minutes . The Kings shot 46 percent from the field and knocked down 11 three - pointers , including five buckets from behind the arc . Buddy Hield led all scorers with 20 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting in his farewell game to Sacramento . The Suns jumped out to a one - point first quarter lead and led by double digits for the entirety of the second half . Phoenix was led by Buddy Hield 's 20 points , and he added five rebounds and one assist in 17 minutes of action . Josh Fox was the only other Kings player to finish in double figures , as he scored 16 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting in 20 minutes off the bench . The Suns outscored the Suns 32 - 38 in the fourth quarter . The Suns host the Portland Trail Blazers on Thursday , and the Kings play the second half of a back - to - back and the home meeting against the two - seed Cavaliers , Heat , on Thursday , the same night of a back - to - back , home - and - home series .
The Miami Heat defeated the Phoenix Suns , 115 - 98 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Friday . Miami were expected to win this game easily , but Phoenix had other ideas . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference , as the Heat recorded 32 assists to just 12 turnovers , while Phoenix committed 20 turnovers to just 27 assists . Three-point shooting was a big factor as well , with Miami hitting 15 - of - 37 from long distance , while Phoenix went 14 - of - 34 . The Heat also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording four more assists than Phoenix , while committing three less turnovers . The Heat ( 10 - 14 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Suns is just what they need to get going . Troy Daniels led the team in scoring , as he tallied 18 points and four rebounds on 6 - of - 13 shooting off the bench . Deandre Ayton was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and 11 rebounds on 8 - of - 11 shooting . Goran Dragic was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 11 points , two rebounds and 10 assists . Troy Daniels led the bench in scoring , dropping 18 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Phoenix will look to play better on Saturday , when they host the Los Angeles Clippers . Troy Daniels led the team in scoring , as he dropped 18 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Dwyane Wade was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 2 points , one rebound and two steals . The Suns next game will be on Saturday , when they host the Los Angeles Clippers .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the Phoenix Suns 123 - 119 at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Monday . The Clippers ( 17 - 9 ) survived a bit of a scare late in Monday 's contest , as they entered the fourth quarter down by a seven - point deficit . However , the Clippers ( 17 - 9 ) battled back steadily in the final period , but went on a 130 run to take a lead at the end of the third quarter . From there , the Clippers dominated the final three quarters , outscoring Phoenix 23 - 25 . It was a close game the whole way . Tobias Harris added 16 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , along with four rebounds , five assists , one steal and two blocks . The Phoenix Suns ( 10 - 32 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 20 - 21 ) 115 - 111 on Tuesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Suns got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 35 - 32 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Suns shot the ball well , going 51 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 48 percent from the floor and 52 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns also out - rebounded the Kings 37 - 43 , giving them even more of an advantage and needed just a chance to win the game . Coming off the bench , Kelly Oubre Jr. led the way , going 9 - for - 15 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding five rebounds , four assists , three steals and a blocked shot in just 30 minutes . The only other King to reach double figures in points was Buddy Hield , who came off the bench for 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) in 31 minutes . T.J. Warren had a strong showing , going 9 - for - 19 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now averaging 21 points and 9 rebounds on the season . Deandre Ayton was also a big factor in the win , recording 17 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , 12 rebounds and a blocked shot . It marked his third double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 10 points and 4 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , Willie Cauley-Stein added 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 8 FT ) , seven rebounds and three blocks . The Suns ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Thursday , while the Suns will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 33 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 28 - 13 ) 102 - 93 on Saturday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Suns got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 31 - 23 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Suns also shot very well in this one , going 41 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets finished at just 39 percent from the floor and a meager 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets were also able to force the Nuggets into 22 turnovers , while committing only nine of their own , which may have made the difference in this one . The Suns were led by Nikola Jokic , who went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his third double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 38 points and 12 rebounds . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Jamal Murray , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 4 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , nine rebounds and three steals in 33 minutes . He 's picked it up offensively of late , averaging 22 points over his last five games , despite averaging only 3 points per game on the season . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Sunday .

The Portland Trail Blazers ( 30 - 20 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 39 ) 120 - 106 on Thursday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 30 - 31 in the first quarter alone . The Trail Blazers were the superior shooters in this game as well , going 47 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 41 percent from the floor and just 34 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were led by the duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum . Lillard shot 7 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding three steals . It was his second impressive performance in a row , as he 's combined for 49 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 9 rebounds on the season . McCollum , on the other hand , went 8 - for - 15 from the floor and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 20 points in 25 minutes off the bench . He 's only reached double figures in points six other times this season , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction Thursday . Coming off the bench , Kelly Oubre Jr. was able to score an efficient 18 points ( 6 - 18 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds , seven assists and three steals in 34 minutes . The Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday , while the Suns will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .

The Phoenix Suns ( 13 - 51 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 30 - 33 ) 118 - 109 on Saturday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Suns got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 33 - 26 in the first quarter alone . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 23 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 48 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns also out - rebounded the Lakers 41 - 40 , giving them even more of an advantage . LeBron James was unstoppable in this one , going 10 - for - 21 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding 16 assists and eight rebounds in 40 minutes . The points were a new season - high for the guard , as it marked just the fourth time this season he 's reached double figures in points . Booker , on the other hand , went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding four rebounds and four assists . Devin Booker had a strong showing as well , posting a team - high of 25 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds and four assists . In a battle between two of the best defenses in the NBA , this game was close throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 14 points , as it came down to the final seconds . Defense was key for the Thunder , as they held the Cavaliers to 39 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Oklahoma City also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists than the Cavaliers , while committing three less turnovers . The Thunder ( 13 - 7 ) have been one of the best teams in the league over recent weeks and a road win in Cleveland just adds to their impressive resume ' . Jordan Clarkson led the team in scoring , as he tallied 25 points , three rebounds and two assists on 10 - of - 22 shooting off the bench . Paul George was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 18 points , four rebounds and four assists . Cedi on deck for Cleveland is a road matchup against the Boston Celtics on Friday . The Thunder had entered Tuesday 's contest sporting an impressive 6 - 5 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Free-throw shooting was decisive , with the Nuggets going 19 - of - 26 from the charity stripe , while the Blazers could only go 16 - of - 26 . Fastbreak points was also a glaring difference , with the Nuggets winning that battle , 160 . The Blazers ( 13 - 9 ) had to play this game without Damian Lillard ( knee ) and it 's clear so hard to overcome . Gary Harris led the team in scoring , as he tallied 27 points , three rebounds and three assists on 9 - of - 21 shooting . Paul Millsap was n't far behind , as he tallied 22 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and four steals . Nikola Jokic was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 15 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Al-Farouq Aminu was a nice spark off the bench , providing 20 points and seven rebounds . The Nuggets ( 13 - 9 ) have been a different team over recent weeks and wire - to - wire wins show just how well they 're playing right now . C.J . McCollum led the team in scoring , as he dropped 33 points on 14 - of - 21 from the field . Paul Millsap was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 22 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and four steals . Monte on deck for Portland is a home matchup against the San Antonio Spurs on Monday .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 108 - 86 , at Moda Center on Thursday . In a battle between two struggling teams , the Blazers were able to prevail with a big road win . The second quarter is where they separated themselves , as they outscored the Suns , 28 - 32 . Shooting was the difference in the game , with Portland shooting 48 percent and Phoenix hitting just 38 percent of their shots . The Trail Blazers also dominated the shooting , hitting 48 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . The Suns shot just 38 percent from the field and 19 percent from long distance . Portland somehow lost , despite being outrebounded , 41 - 56 . Damian Lillard was a lone bright spot for Phoenix , as he led the team with 25 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Josh Collins was second on the team , with his 10 points and five rebounds . Deandre Ayton was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 11 points and eight rebounds . Portland 's next game is on Saturday , when they take on the Miami Heat at home . The Blazers ( 14 - 11 ) have been a different team over recent weeks and blowout wins like this show just how good they can be . Damian Lillard did all he could to keep the Suns hanging around , as he accumulated 25 points , five rebounds and eight assists on 8 - of - 14 shooting . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Blazers recording 28 assists to 16 turnovers , while the Bulls committed 12 turnovers to 22 assists . That 's evident by the fact that Portland took a 22 - point lead into halftime and never relinquished the lead after that . The Bulls ( 10 - 31 ) were in a bit of a slide , so a road win against the Bulls is just what the doctor ordered . Thomas led the team with 25 points , while Tomas Satoransky provided a double - double off the bench as well . Up next for Denver is a matchup with the New York Knicks on Saturday .
The Miami Heat ( 36 - 37 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 30 - 44 ) 113 - 108 on Saturday . Miami came into this game as a rare road favorite and could n't muster up enough for a win . The key for Miami was their defense , as they held Washington to 43 percent shooting and forced them to commit 12 turnovers . The Heat were unconscious from the field , as they went 50 percent from the field , 31 percent from three - point range and 68 percent from the free - throw line . The Heat also dominated the rebounding and assists , as they snatched down 44 boards to the Wizards 53 . The Heat also took care of business at the charity stripe , going 13 - of - 19 , with the Wizards hitting just 9 - of - 23 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Heat recording 29 assists to just 11 turnovers , while the Wizards committed 12 turnovers to 25 assists . Jeff Green led the Wizards in scoring , as he dropped 25 points , six rebounds and five assists . No other starter had more than 18 points , as the other four starters combined for just 23 points . Bobby Portis recorded a double - double off the bench , accruing 14 points and 11 rebounds . Kelly Olynyk was a huge spark off the bench , as he amassed 14 points , seven rebounds , five assists , three steals and three blocks . On deck for the Heat is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Tuesday . The Wizards ( 30 - 44 ) are now just 5 - 6 across their last 12 games . Thomas Wade was the team 's best player , as he tallied 20 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Dion Waiters was n't far behind , tallying 19 points , three rebounds and three assists of his own . Bam on deck for Washington is a matchup with the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 22 - 57 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 32 - 47 ) 115 - 114 on Wednesday . This game meant much more to the Bulls than Wizards and it was evident by the result . The second quarter is when Chicago made their mark , as they outscored Washington , 27 - 30 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was a huge factor as well , as the Bulls recorded 22 assists to 20 turnovers , while the Wizards committed 12 turnovers to 24 assists . Washington had to lean on their bench heavily in this game , with four players scoring at least 11 points . JaKarr Sampson led the team in scoring with 24 points off the bench , while JaKarr Sampson scored a team - high 18 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting . On deck for the Bulls is a matchup with the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday . Washington has been struggling mightily recently and this performance is indicative of their form since the All-Star break , as they 've lost five of their last six games . Bobby Portis was especially great , as he scored 20 points and grabbed 10 rebounds in the loss . Rookie Bradley Beal also had a nice game , as he amassed 19 points , four rebounds and two assists in just 22 minutes of action . Robin Lopez also had a nice game , as he amassed 12 points , five rebounds and two blocks . The Bulls will look to build off this win when they take on the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 46 - 34 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 32 - 48 ) 129 - 112 on Friday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . The two teams combined for just 79 points in the first half and shot horrendously . The Wizards actually outshot the Wizards 56 percent to 48 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range in the game . The free - throw shooting was the difference in the game , as the Spurs went 17 - for - 20 while the Wizards went just 9 - for - 32 . Washington did dominate down low though , as they scored a season - high 70 points in the paint , while outrebounding the Spurs 34 to 24 . The Spurs came into this game as a huge underdog , but gave a valiant effort in a tough defeat . Bradley Beal was the star of the show , as he tallied 25 points , two rebounds and five assists . Rudy Gay also had a great game , as he tallied 18 points , six rebounds and four assists . Up next for San Antonio is a matchup with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday . This was Washington 's first game without Danilo Parker and it really hurt them down the stretch . LaMarcus Aldridge had a fantastic game , as he collected 24 points , seven rebounds and two assists in the win . Bryn Forbes also had a nice game , as he amassed 17 points , one rebound and four assists . Up next for San Antonio is a matchup with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Celtics Celtics , 116 - 25 , at FedEx Forum on Tuesday . In a battle between two struggling teams , the game was tight throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 17 points , as it came down to the final seconds . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Celtics going 15 - of - 44 from long distance , while the Celtics hit just 17 - of - 17 . Fastbreak points was key as well , with Boston winning that differential , 15 - 8 . The Celtics ( 38 - 50 ) have now lost five of their last six games , as they continue to fight for a playoff berth . Bradley Beal was the player of the game , as he tallied 16 points , five rebounds and four assists . Bradley Beal was n't far behind , totaling 16 points , five rebounds and four assists . PJ Hunter recorded a double - double , amassing 12 points and 11 rebounds . Robert Bryant was the only Celtics starter in double figures , as he totaled 14 points and six rebounds . Tomas Satoransky led the bench with 17 points and three rebounds . On deck for the Celtics is a road matchup against the Boston Celtics on Tuesday . The Wizards ( 32 - 50 ) are fighting for a playoff berth and blown leads like this are devastating for that pursuit . Brad Antetokonmpo was the team 's best player , as he tallied 18 points , 14 rebounds and five assists . Bradley Beal finished with 16 points , five rebounds and four assists . Jaylen Brown led the bench with 15 points , three rebounds and two assists , while Guerschon a season - high .
